# Create an App Store Version Localization

**Web Service Endpoint**

Add localized version-level information for a new locale.

## Discussion

Use this endpoint to add localized version information for a new locale. Be sure to use [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appInfoLocalizations] to add the same locale to the version as well.



### Add Localized App Store Version Information in US English



## Creating, Modifying, and Deleting Version Localizations

- **Modify an App Store Version Localization**: Modify localized version-level information for a particular language.
- **Delete an App Store Version Localization**: Delete a language from your version metadata.
